High Prefect Drikus:
Dejakar Pa'agrio! Congratulations! You are now a proud Orc Monk. Devote yourself so that the honor of the Orc race remains untarnished!
Learn your skills one by one from Prefect Buka nearby.
And here is a small gift to help you in your journey! Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you can exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon!
